Description:
Show when a monitor or a span/rspan is setup or modified

Author: Austin Clark
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Cisco Sniffing
Query: sourcetype='cisco-aaa' eql select * from _source_ where (log like '%monitor capture point%' or log like '%set span%' or log like '%set rspan%')
